mapper.select: SELECT A.product_id productId,A.p_title title,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,B.thumbnail thumbnail,A.sale_volumn volumn from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id group by A.product_id ORDER BY created_at desc LIMIT #{startIdx},#{row};

select A.product_id productId,A.p_title title,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,B.thumbnail thumbnail,A.sale_volumn volumn from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id group by A.product_id ORDER BY RAND() limit 5

select A.product_id productId,A.p_title title,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,B.thumbnail thumbnail,A.sale_volumn volumn from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_allergy C ON A.product_id=C.product_id where C.allergy_id not in(#{strallergy}) group by A.product_id order by A.sale_volumn desc,rand() limit 4

select A.product_id productId,A.p_title title,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,B.thumbnail thumbnail,A.sale_volumn volumn from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation C ON A.product_id=C.product_id WHERE C.cate_id=#{cate} group by A.product_id order by A.sale_volumn desc,rand() LIMIT #{startIdx},#{row}

select count(distinct A.product_id) from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation C ON A.product_id=C.product_id WHERE C.cate_id=#{cate} order by A.sale_volumn desc,rand()

select A.product_id productId,A.p_title title,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,B.thumbnail thumbnail,A.sale_volumn volumn from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation C ON A.product_id=C.product_id LEFT JOIN product_allergy D ON A.product_id=D.product_id WHERE C.cate_id=#{cate} and D.allergy_id not in(#{strallergy}) group by A.product_id order by A.sale_volumn desc,rand() LIMIT #{startIdx},#{row}

select COUNT(distinct A.product_id) from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation C ON A.product_id=C.product_id LEFT JOIN product_allergy D ON A.product_id=D.product_id WHERE C.cate_id=#{cate} and !(D.allergy_id in(#{strallergy})) order by A.sale_volumn desc,RAND()
